additionalArtifacts.description: A list of additional artifacts. Valid values are: `REDSHIFT`, `QUICKSIGHT`, `ATHENA`. When ATHENA exists within additional_artifacts, no other artifact type can be declared and report_versioning must be `OVERWRITE_REPORT`.

additionalSchemaElements.description: A list of schema elements. Valid values are: `RESOURCES`, `SPLIT_COST_ALLOCATION_DATA`.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the cur report.

compression.description: Compression format for report. Valid values are: `GZIP`, `ZIP`, `Parquet`. If `Parquet` is used, then format must also be `Parquet`.

format.description: Format for report. Valid values are: `textORcsv`, `Parquet`. If `Parquet` is used, then Compression must also be `Parquet`.

refreshClosedReports.description: Set to true to update your reports after they have been finalized if AWS detects charges related to previous months.

reportName.description: Unique name for the report. Must start with a number/letter and is case sensitive. Limited to 256 characters.

reportVersioning.description: Overwrite the previous version of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous versions. Valid values are: `CREATE_NEW_REPORT` and `OVERWRITE_REPORT`.

s3Bucket.description: Name of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

s3Prefix.description: Report path prefix. Limited to 256 characters.

s3Region.description: Region of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

timeUnit.description: The frequency on which report data are measured and displayed.  Valid values are: `DAILY`, `HOURLY`, `MONTHLY`.
